name: Arif Widodo Pratama
text:
Good place to go if you need some fresh air.
Not so far from the city of Pamekasan, it takes about 30mins to get there.
Best time to visit is around 7AM to 9AM while the place is still quite.
Or around 4PM to 6PM to enjoy the sunset.
